mapper.select: select distinct sort_id,user_mission_id,user_openid,user_name,user_avatarUrl,user_score from a_student_info natural join user_info group by user_openid having sort_id=#{sort_id} and user_openid!=#{user_openid}

select distinct sort_id,user_mission_id,user_openid,user_name,user_avatarUrl,user_score from a_student_info natural join user_info natural join mission_reserve_info group by user_openid having COUNT(user_openid) > 1
mapper.insert: insert into mission_reserve_info (mission_id, sort_id, user_openid, customer_user_openid, isReserved) values (#{user_mission_id}, #{sort_id}, #{user_openid}, #{customer_user_openid}, #{isReserved})
